intro: Choose your implementation journey based on your context, experience level, and goals. Each journey provides a curated set of tools designed to work together effectively.

recommendationNotice.title: Recommended for You
recommendationNotice.description: Based on your assessment, we recommend starting with the highlighted journey below.

confirmation.title: Journey Selected!
confirmation.description: You've selected the {journey} journey. You can now explore the specific tools and begin your implementation.

gettingStarted.title: Getting Started
gettingStarted.description: Perfect for new initiatives and communities just beginning their governance journey

crisisResponse.title: Crisis Response
crisisResponse.description: Rapid deployment tools for emergency governance situations and system breakdowns

buildingCapacity.title: Building Capacity
buildingCapacity.description: Comprehensive tools for growing and strengthening existing governance initiatives

deepeningPractice.title: Deepening Practice
deepeningPractice.description: Advanced tools for mature initiatives ready to pioneer new approaches

evolutionTransition.title: Evolution & Transition
evolutionTransition.description: Tools for fundamental system transformation and graceful transitions
